generated_body: In this article, the user may find a detailed account of a birthday cake order that did not meet expectations, specifically focusing on a unicorn-themed cake. The piece is likely to describe the circumstances surrounding the order, including the design and delivery process, and highlight the reasons why the cake was considered an "epic fail." Overall, readers can expect a narrative that combines elements of humor and relatability regarding birthday celebrations and cake mishaps.
